short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your sensitive info by blurring and hiding any element text, image, input or paragraphs with single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With getblur.io you can now blur any element on a webpage with a single click and hide sensitive information while you are screen sharing or recording your video. This will help you save hours of video post processing time while keeping your data secure.

With cutting edge technology you can even keep the blur between reloads,  change blur intensity and do so much more. Head over to www.getblur.io to get more info and get yourself a license key.

Here is what users have been saying about getblur.io:

"We are a content creation agency and record multiple tutorial videos throughout the day, getblur.io has made our life so  much easier and has saved us so much time from post processing videos to add blur functionality."


"The amount of time and effort we were putting to edit videos has been cut in half, thanks to getblur.io. Would have happily bought this for 2X the price."


"A simple and intuitive software for a complex problem."


"Love this extension. I can now blur all the unwanted content and only show the valuable information to my students during online class. Saves me from a constant fear of my sensitive info getting revealed during online call."
